Title: ScrewTurn Helper
Description:
Silverlight app makes it easier to convert different sources to ScrewTurn Wiki markup syntax. 

One-click format of csv/tab delimited tables, csharp/pascal/tsql sources. All you need is a couple of copy/paste activity.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight app makes it easier to convert different sources to ScrewTurn Wiki markup syntax.

One-click format of csv/tab delimited tables, csharp/pascal/tsql sources. All you need is a couple of copy/paste activity.


To see in action (don't forget to bookmark!), go here

the Screwturn is open-source wiki library written on .Net technology. Syntax is quite similar to MeadiaWiki, but slightly differ, giving the project ticket to raise.
